privates.name: The King's Mail
privates.description: Always assigned to the PEIR company. The PEIR starts with $200 in its treasury. Closes with other privates on the 4+.

privates.name: Merchants and Co.
privates.description: May be exchanged for an exchange share of the Shortline during the stock round.

privates.name: Vernon River Bridge Company
privates.description: Blocks: N18 (player choice). Unblocks when exchanged. May be exchanged for an exchange share of the Shortline.

privates.name: Ice Boat Shipping
privates.description: May be exchanged for a share from the market of any company that isn't the Mainline or Shortline.

privates.name: Shipbuilding
privates.description: May be exchanged for an exchange share of the Shortline during the stock round.

privates.name: Hunslet Steam Engine
privates.description: May be sold to a company for $1 to $200. May not be sold to the PEIR. The owning company may close this to buy a train from the supply anytime during its operation.

privates.name: Mainline Concession
privates.description: Comes with the (20%) president's certificate of the Mainline company. Closes when the Mainline operates. The Mainline may operate as soon as this item is sold.

privates.name: Schreiber and Burpee Construction
privates.description: Comes with yellow straight tile. Placement counts as normal tile lay. Must follow all normal track laying rules.

privates.name: Shortline Concession
privates.description: Comes with the (20%) president's certificate of the Shortline. Closes when the Shortline operates.

privates.name: Union Bank
privates.description: Comes with one Mainline share and one random (not Mainline or Shortline) share. Does not close. Owning player may buy 1 share per stock round for the bank combining the bank's treasury with their own.

turns.name: Stock Round
steps: Buy one certificate or start company
